FuncDef: This command configures the number of ports down and level for interface s multicast CAC policy.

ParaDef.Info: If the number of ports available in the LAG is reduced by the number of ports configured in this command here then bandwidth allowed for bundle and/or interface will be as per the levels configured in this context. Values-1 to 64 (for 64-link LAG).
Specifies an entry for the multicast CAC policy constraint level configured on this system. Values-1 to 8.
